content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: City vehicles should not expect to park wherever they please.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 2:
Text: It's good to find the right partner for yourself.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 3:
Text: It's wrong to love people who are engaged.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: It's expected that people who do illegal acts will have consequences.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 5:
Text: It's expected that families will not get along well with their in-laws.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 6:
Text: It's okay to have sex on camera.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: It's okay to show your disgruntlement with what someone does.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 8:
Text: It's good to have a best friend.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: It's okay to not feel guilty when you cheat.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 10:
Text: It's responsible to take part in rearing a younger sibling.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 11:
Text: You shouldn't clone dinosaurs because that would just cause a lot of problems.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 12:
Text: It is reasonable to want to hold onto loving memories after losing someone.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 13:
Text: It's normal for people to want their loved ones to be happy.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 14:
Text: It's wrong for people that care about each other to argue.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 15:
Text: It's wrong to uproot your family and move to a place where you have no connections and don't know anyone.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 16:
Text: It's not normal to dislike everybody
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 17:
Text: It's wrong to not understand sometimes peoples situation isn't the best.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 18:
Text: You shouldn't expect your ex to not have sex after the relationship is over.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 19:
Text: It's okay to be offended when your partner doesn't want you cooking for their kids.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: It is understandable for parents to want to take care of their child when they are in need.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 21:
Text: It’s important to have hobbies.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 22:
Text: It's wrong to grow apart from your partner.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 23:
Text: It's expected that girlfriends will want to look out for their boyfriends.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 24:
Text: It's good to have income.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 25:
Text: Throwing unused cardboard in the garbage is wasteful.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 26:
Text: It's fine to get angry if someone doesn't want to do something you want them to do.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 27:
Text: It's wrong to spend other people's money.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: It's not okay to be in a romantic relationship with a teacher.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's not okay to set yourself up where their could be an argument with friends.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: You shouldn't let people who claim to be fashion police criticize your clothes.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Human-rated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: You should not engage in romance with a patient you treat.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: Before kicking someone out it is important to make sure your feelings will be permanent.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: It's hurtful to hate somebody close to you.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 4:
Text: It's bad to feel other people are inferior to you.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 5:
Text: It's not okay to fake things in a social situation.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 6:
Text: It's expected that the husband pay child support.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: You shouldn't call out your family over petty things.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: Adults are expected to bathe daily.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 9:
Text: It's ok to tell someone you aren't interested in talking when you're busy at work.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 10:
Text: It's wrong to be too needy to people because people find it annoying.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: You should not pursue a relationship with someone much younger than you.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 12:
Text: It's not okay to be to happy with a material object.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 13:
Text: Your grandparent would be sad if you broke off contact with them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: Families should be able to talk out their problems with each other.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It's good to get help when you need it.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: Your boyfriend has the right to wear whatever underwear he chooses.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 17:
Text: It's good to teach children that their boundaries should be respected.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It's wrong to lash out at someone.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: It is okay to not want to go to a party.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: You should be understanding of your family's decisions when they're weak.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 21:
Text: You shouldn't be bitter and salty about petty things.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 22:
Text: It's understandable if you're suspicious when a widower in your family gets together with a widower soon after their spouse's died.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 23:
Text: You shoulld not worry about others being jealous when posting things on facebook.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: It's bad for a child to be in danger.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: You shouldn't wear a nightdress if you're male.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 26:
Text: It's wrong to assume someone has a disability because they talk differently.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: It's not okay to stray from a relationship.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: You should always help out your customers when they have a problem.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's okay to not know how to drive.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 30:
Text: People are expected to want to be close to their family.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Target Example:
Text: You shouldn't discriminate against people because of their income level.
Annotation from annotator:
